|---|---|---|---|
| 1 – 40 | 25% | 20% | 15% |
| 41 – 60 | 30% | 25% | 20% |
| 61 – 75 | 35% | 30% | 25% |
| 76 – 85 | 40% | 35% | 30% |
| 86 – 90 | 45% | 40% | 35% |
| >90 | 50% | 45% | 40% |

text:
## Table J: Co-insurance

| Treatment Type | Claimable Amount Accumulated within a Policy Year | Co-insurance Rate |
|---|---|---|
| Inpatient/day surgery | First $5,000 (inclusive of deductible) | 10% |
| Inpatient/day surgery | Next $5,000 | 5% |
| Inpatient/day surgery | Above $10,000 | 3% |
| Outpatient treatment | Not applicable | 10% |

## MediShield Life Claim Computation Breakdown

| Item Description | Hospital bill | MediShield Life claim computation |
|---|---|---|
| Daily ward & treatment charges (2 days normal ward + 8 days ICU) | $8,600 | $8,600 |
| Surgical procedure (Table 6B) | $1,250 | $1,250 |
| Total | $9,850 | $9,850 |
| Less deductible | - | ($1,500) |
| Claimable amount (less deductible) | - | $8,350 |
| Less co-insurance | - | ($592.50) |
| MediShield Life pays | - | $7,757.50 (79%) |
| MediSave and/or cash | - | $2,092.50 (21%) |

| Daily ward & treatment charges (18 days normal ward) | $12,000 | $4,200 ($12,000 x 35%) | $4,200 |
| Surgical procedure (Table 5C) | $8,500 | $2,975 ($8,500 x 35%) | $2,180 |
| Implant | $4,000 | $1,400 ($4,000 x 35%) | $1,400 |
| Total | $24,500 | $8,575 | $7,780 |
| Less deductible | - | - | ($2,000) |
| Claimable amount (less deductible) | - | - | $5,780 |
| Less co-insurance | - | - | ($439) |
| MediShield Life pays | - | - | **$5,341 (22%)** |
| MediSave and/or cash | - | - | $19,159 (78%) |
